titles.title: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services issue regulations to ensure due process rights for physicians furnishing emergency medical services.
To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services issue regulations to ensure due process rights for physicians furnishing emergency medical services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to issue regulations that require a certain adminstrative process before hospitals may terminate or restrict the privileges of physicians who provide emergency medical services.
